reviewText: I fear the possibility of any persons taking there life if lay continue to stay near who ever bully and Sofia from Sofia the first really need to stay away from her sister Amber to a void that possible happening this one movie that prove that Sofia and her bully evil dangerous sister Amber need to stay away from each other in had a great experience with this product here

I love the Series a lot (I'm a guy who's way beyond the target audience) interesting music, a colorful cast of characters and lessons on the value of friendship! It's a must have for everyone! Also I find it strange that the Japanese Version not only has The Original English Audio but also English Subtitles too!
